author: Dave Lawler
title: Religion in the age of coronavirus
description: Few aspects of life bring as many people together as religion. Why it matters: In most crises, that is a blessing. In a pandemic, it can be dangerous. As the coronavirus spread beyond China, some of the earliest outbreaks were traced to religious services or …
content:
Few aspects of life bring as many people together as religion.
Why it matters: In most crises, that is a blessing. In a pandemic, it can be dangerous.
